title: Good for those who want to maintain the same tension for awhile or adjust individual finger tension; but tension is not marked
review:
I had carpal tunnel surgery on both hands a couple of years ago. As a result of the surgery, I had no strength in my hands. In order to build strength, I purchased some of the same tools the therapist had in her office in addition to other tools that serve the same purpose. I also continually look for new exercisers such as this to see how they stack up against what I have.

The CanDo GripMasters are my first choice over this exerciser; however, this is a close second. First, I like the silicone base which makes it easy on the palm of my hand. Second, the tension available is from 5 to 9 pounds. The negative is that I only know the tension because of the marking on the packaging. There's no way to tell the tension on the unit itself. However, once I know that it extends from 5 to 9 pounds, I can count the tension based on the linear marks the wheel touches as I rotate the tightener for each finger in 1/2 pound increments. This is a big hate for me. They need to mark from 5 to 9 pounds on the unit itself and not just the packaging. If I were cycling through a workout of various tensions, I would not like this unit as I have to adjust the tension four times for each pressure increase of a 1/2 pound. Someone who had carpal tunnel may get trigger finger (like I did) and having to make adjustments repeatedly is bad for those fingers. Nevertheless, if I wanted all the tensions in one unit and did not intend to graduate in strength until I have am successful at the lower tensions, then this unit would be perfect. Also, if I wanted each finger to have a different tension, this provides the ability to set that.

In case anyone is interested, below are the strengtheners I already have. The first one is very light and only needed if one doesn't have any strength in their hands like me. If there is some strength, then I recommend the 3, 5, 7, & 9 pounds only.

[[ASIN:B00HB7V6JY CanDo GripMaster Hand Exerciser, Yellow, X-Light Tension (1.5 lbs per finger]]
[[ASIN:B00HB7V6GC CanDo GripMaster Hand Exerciser, Red, Light Tension (3 lbs per finger)]]
[[ASIN:B00HB7V6KS CanDo GripMaster Hand Exerciser, Green, Medium Tension (5 lbs per finger)]]
[[ASIN:B00HB7V6JO CanDo GripMaster Hand Exerciser, Blue, Heavy Tension (7 lbs per finger)]]
[[ASIN:B00HB7V6HG CanDo GripMaster Hand Exerciser, Black, X-Heavy Tension (9 lbs per finger]]
[[ASIN:B000UMHUSI PRO Hand and Finger Exerciser, Extra-Heavy Tension (11 lbs per finger)]] - TERRIBLE GRIP, NOT RECOMMENDED
[[ASIN:B00KH3L7KC PRO Hand and Finger Exerciser, XX-Heavy Tension (13 lbs per finger)]] - TERRIBLE GRIP, NOT RECOMMENDED
[[ASIN:B01N02D3IV Flanger FA-10P Tension Adjustable Hand Exerciser for Beginner Guitar, Piano and Patient]] - TERRIBLE; doesn't adjust well, difficult to use, etc.
[[ASIN:B01NBY83AE Gaiam Restore Easy Adjust Hand Grip]] - okay but can't tell the tension
[[ASIN:B077V7HPLD FILA Accessories 2 Pack Hand Grips]] - fixed tension but love this for strengthening hands and not fingers

Other than that I still like the seat. It is comfy and good for your behind. Oh yea it’s light to carry and easy to store.

title: Easy to use, works well.
review:
Five stars for a product that works well and does what it advertises. First set up was so easy. One thing that's great is that there are various mounting options, so you can choose the one that works the best for you. You can even attach it to your shoe, which was great. It is small and inconspicuous, which is nice, and makes it less likely someone will try to grab it.

It was easy to get it connected and start working and it worked just fine. I find this a useful way to monitor your biking performance and see how you improve over time. No, it doesn't quite have all the different features some similar products have, but it doesn't say it does. I was happy with it and would recommend it.

title: Great set
review:
They liked this archery set. It was fun. It would be good for a party.
We really like things to keep the kids active. I would much prefer them doing something than watching something. It is great because it is like a game for them but then they are being physically active.

The quality was good. It worked as it was supposed to. It wasn’t too hard to set up.

This is a great activity for a day when you don’t know what else to do or you want your child to burn off some energy. It is a good way to keep a child busy.

The children really liked it.

I feel like this is good for child development. It kept my children's interest. It would also make a nice gift.

I would recommend it.

title: Good product
review: They could be easier to use and could be more comfortable but they served their purpose.

title: This hat is for small heads only, so it fits me perfectly
review:
This review is for the denim blue hat.

I like that this hat is foldable and comes with a thin cinch pouch. The denim is malleable so that I can wear the rim up on the sides or out. There is a tie around the rim to cinch the hat tighter. However, I have a small head (around 7-1/8) and this fits me perfectly. I feel it would be too tight if my head were bigger.

It comes with a drawstring for the chin. It was difficult to get the hooks into the tiny loops in either side of the temple but I eventually managed.

Overall, this is perfect for summer.

title: Five Stars
review: works better than a horn in a truck :)

title: Cup
review: This cup has a beautiful design. Very unique. Good enough size for decent amount of coffee or other liquid. Sturdy/ durable. Easy to clean and fits in my car cup holder perfectly. I would recommend this item.

title: Good shade, difficult to set up.
review:
We used this a couple of times thus far, and both times, despite reading the instructions carefully, we struggled setting it up. The back just won't set correctly for us, for some reason.

I consider myself pretty good at reading and following instructions. I can set up pretty much anything with instructions, even if they're not the greatest. I figured with the Coleman sun shade, this will be great and easy to set up for beaches. We already have other beach gear from Coleman and they've all functioned perfectly.

This sun shade is spacious and perfect for the beaches. My wife and I and our two little ones sit comfortably inside, though there's not much space for anything else, not even big beach chairs. No problem. What bothered us is that, even though we both helped set it up, the back wouldn't stay put. It would lift from the sand, or not be positioned correctly at all, and allow sunlight to enter from the back. We've had to utilize rocks and beach towels to compensate.

title: Won't fit in car cupholders - four different cars don't fit
review:
I almost love this cup, but it has a serious flaw for me. It doesn't fit in the car cupholders. At all. We tried it in the Kia Soul, the F-150, an older Ford Edge and a new Buick Encore. None of the cupholders in any of these vehicles fit this cup and that is a problem for me. The whole point of this cup is to take sweet tea with me. As it stands now, this cup is only useful at home. It's too far to carry comfortably in your hand for a walk.

It has gone through the dishwasher with no problems. It does seem to keep my sweet tea cold for a couple of hours inside the house and maybe forty minutes if I'm outside with it.

title: Helpful tracker
review:
This watch performs better than my Fitbit and for a fraction of the cost. There are similarities between the two but Amazfit works smoother for me. It takes my oxygen and heart rate accurately. I’m not a medical professional but it provides readings which are helpful for my asthma and they’re the same as my oximeter and pulse meter. Great buy!!! The app provides enough detail to monitor your health. There’s also a log to tracker blood pressure and periods. I had one incident where the app did not work but it was resolved within the same day. The tracker can be for 15 days if you don’t use all the features. But if you use most of the features like me, I charge it about every 5 days. This is not a burden because it charges in less than two hours.

This may be my go to gift for friends/family.

title: Easy to Store, Easy to Assemble
review: The tent literally does pop right up! It also stores easily. We folded it right back into the round, flat shape as it arrived and it's on the wall of the garage, handy, but out of the way. I like that this is so lightweight! It's better for warm weather camping. This would be ideal to take along on small camping trips, or take along fishing for a nap in instant shade! It's easy enough to assemble that middle-school age kids can do it themselves. I'd recommend this little tent to anyone that would like to have a small tent for short trips in warm weather. Thanks for reading, if this was helpful, kindly click the button below.

title: Fantastic quality stainless steel percolator
review:
Fantastic quality stainless steel percolator. In addition to the features listed in the description, there are 2 more that I love:

The glass perk knob is threaded and screws snuggly into the flip top lid. It is totally secure, does not ‘wiggle’ around and cannot fall out. This is a great detail.

Also. the perforated coffee basket’s flat top has a nicely recessed lip which is held in place by the flip top lid. This ensures the pressure of the boiling water cannot ‘lift’ the top. This feature prevents the grounds from being pushed up out of the basket, and into your coffee. Super design - I have never seen this before on any coffee basket insert.

Makes a great cup of coffee
9 cup capacity
Super easy to clean

title: Nice tail light with great mounting options & cool features like an alarm & remote
review:
I wanted to add a tail light to my daughter's bicycle & forgot that one has the alarm. I love the tail light, she loves the alarm & the remote. The tail light has two mountings options, a clamp that wraps around the seat post & secures with a screw & a mount that attaches to the seat frame with cable ties.

I used the under-seat mount with the cable ties &, though it was fiddlesome, it mounted very tidy & firm. I actually tried the seat post mount first but it wouldn't clamp firmly around the 1" seat post, even with the included rubber shim. I'm happy with the under-seat mount because it looks much more clean & is more firmly mounted.

The best setting for the tail light is the motion-activated break light but that requires cycling through the other 3 flashing options first. I wish that it would remember the previous setting & keep it. The light is bright enough to be seen in traffic & the alarm is impressively, VERY loud.

The instructions for this kit were unusually good if very small. I really appreciate a set of instructions with installation illustrations & that are specific to the product & these are very good.

title: Nice Quality
review: My teenagers have been wanting a basketball hoop for a while. This one seems to be a nice quality one. First of all, we did not receive any instructions. My husband went to the Franklin Sports website and ended up contacting them. They emailed him a PDF with the instructions within a short time. It came with a couple of little wrenches to put it together, but my husband used his own socket set which made it a little easier. He put it together by himself, but he said it would definitely be easier with a second person. You can adjust the height, but it's not something you would do frequently. Some others have a lever that you can use to change the height. This one requires you to unscrew the screw and then adjust the tube (within a tube - telescoping). It's kind of like the pop up tents, except instead of the button you have to press, you have to unscrew the screw. It would be much easier to have a second person to help you if you are changing heights.  My husband found it easier to put the whole thing on the side to adjust the height. There are wheels on the bottom of the base so you can move it if needed. We have a two door garage and have it placed against the brick between the doors. It fits well and doesn't interfere with our cars.

title: Pay attention to sizing...
review:
I got this set for my husband, as he is an avid swimmer at our local pool. The sizing was different than what we expected. The fins were the L/XL size we were looking for, but the mask came in a small. Unfortunately, the mask was too tight for my husband to use. However, the fins work great. He loves the smaller size and said they are easier to maneuver around the pool vs. his extra long fins.

I went with him to the pool one night so I could try out the snorkel mask. We are both dive certified and snorkel whenever we get the opportunity to do a fun beach vacation, so I thought this mask would be great. It felt a bit awkward to use when you are used to a normal snorkel. It made me feel a bit claustrophobic. I also couldn't see as clearly as my regular snorkeling glasses. In a pinch, I would use these, but the wouldn't fit the bill as my "go to" choice.

title: Fit well and nice quality.
review: These came in quickly and are a very nice quality. They fit very well on a size 10 1/2 foot.  They are comfortable and help propel well.  I recommend these flippers.  We have the blue flippers.  Enjoy!

title: Love the Shaker Cup
review: This confuses me just a little bit. The shaker cup portion is awesome. I love having the large jack in the cup to shake up powdered drinks. It works really well. The jack is washable and does come out of the cup. That means you could lose the shaker portion of this cup, so be careful. The collapsible bottom, I don’t understand. I’m not entirely sure what you should store in there. You could put your protein powder in there for making your drink later. But couldn’t you just put the powder in the cup? It is almost like those snack and drink cups that make for toddlers. I guess you could put a snack in there like a kid. That’d be fun. It is just a little weird and I would prefer the cup without it. (Which they do make.)

title: Seahawk Cane 6-Pack Ornaments
review: These canes are OK from a distance on the tree.  Not flawless, but they look fine hanging on my 4' tree.  The lettering is not perfect (slightly distorted, run together a bit), and the stripe stickers might not last many years.  This is my first Seahawk related ornament, so I kept them.

title: Smooth Retrieve and Excellent Zero-Reverse Clutch
review:
I have only recently became aware of Tempo as a tackle manufacturer and so far my experiences with their rods and reels have been positive. I selected this specific reel for saltwater use. So far it has been a fine reel and has worked out well for me.

I selected the 6000 size which is the largest available. I have large hands, and the type of fish I am targeting will need some room to run when hooked. This is a good-sized reel and it has some excellent attributes.

The body itself is aluminum (according to the product description; I thought it was graphite) and is resistant to corrosion and rust which is good. It has a nice, smooth finish and I like the aesthetics of it. It’s gray with gold paint and some chrome-colored trim, eye catching but not gaudy.

In operation this reel is a smooth operator. The cast and retrieve are smooth in terms of what the reel handles; that is, line peels off easily and the retrieve is smooth and glassy, though this can be impacted negatively by what rod you use. It has an excellent zero-reverse clutch and when engaged gives no reverse play at all, not even a tiny bit. The drag system is also very good and it can be set to be very stiff and unyielding for larger fish or soft and sensitive for smaller fish.

The handle is surprisingly large, bigger than that of most reels. For smaller hands it might be a little awkward because of the size, but for me it is very comfortable and easy to work with.

This is a nice reel and so far I am happy with it. It works smoothly and it seems to be made very well, and the fact that it looks attractive is a plus. The price point is the cherry on top that makes it easy to recommend.

title: Nice Quality
review: My 19 year old daughter has become obsessed with cow print recently. She's absolutely thrilled with her new cow print bucket hat!! She has a fairly normal head size and this fits her well. It's a good thickness and a nice quality. It's a cute and trendy hat.

title: Very convenient
review: Excellent for camping or traveling

title: Five Stars
review: love these towels

title: thin walls don't keep the temp very well, handle not comfy to hold
review:
At first, I liked how this looked, then I tested it. I put ice and water in it. The glass itself got VERY cold on the outside. Next, I put very hot water in it and the glass got very hot on the outside. I got out my laser temp gun and the difference between inside and outside was closer than you would guess. After this failure, I got out other brands that I already had and they did much better.

The handle looks fine until you hold it for a while. It just is not comfortable for me to hold very long.

Overall for the price, I would not recommend this one.

title: Good hammock for two people to share
review: Love this hammock, it's easy to set up and take down. It's a little big when it's just me because the sides rise up, so if you plan to mostly use a hammock alone you may want the single. This is a good, comfortable hammock for two people. I really love the color as well.

title: Love
review: Bike looks awesome

title: Poorly designed - does not stay at desired height setting no matter what
review: Got a great deal on this from Woot!. Turns out it wasn't such a great deal--this simply does not function correctly. No matter what I try, short of finding a hex screwdriver to tighten the clasp, the top part of the handle will not stay in place when used. Hand-tightening it to the tightest setting is not enough, and I'm a strong guy. Also, you can tell the rubber foot will wear through with little use. This is cheap junk. Not recommended. Disappointing.

title: Looks like it works
review:
Amazingly simple device, and easy to use. You'll need a smartphone -- I have a 3-year-old Samsung Android phone, which works just fine. It comes in a nice little box, which you'll probably want to keep to store the device in. The quick-start guide helps you download and install the Kardia mobile app, and then create an account with them. I was up and running in about 5 minutes.

Taking the reading is very straightforward, and produces a nicely formatted EKG picture in the app on the phone. If you want to, you can manually add a blood pressure reading and/or weight, and the app keeps all this information together for you. Pretty slick. I'll use this probably once a week, or whenever it seems needed.

title: DON'T LEAVE HOME WITHOUT IT!!
review: Makes me feel more secure just having this. I gave one to a friend and we are now both comfortable with this product.

Nice gloves - size runs a little big!
They are heavy so better for early Spring and late Fall golfing.

The maker is great easily detached and bright pink so easy to see on the green but lays flat!

title: Great design adds to my sailboat overall look
review: Such a beautiful cowl vent. I’m going to install it on my main deck dorade  to replace an older plastic model that has imbedded dirt on it. I like the screw down feature on the inside collar to keep it in place.  It came with a star fitting deck plate. The star key not included with the vent was only $20 and looks just as great as the vent.

title: Comfortable mat
review: This is a wonderful mat!  It's well made and comfortable.  I lay a towel on top of mine for added comfort.  It's kind of a space hog, but worth it.  It folds easily and can be stored under a bed or behind a piece of furniture.

title: Our golfer loves it!
review: Great gift for a frustrated golfer who doesn’t get out there as often as he wants - and one who is teaching his son, as well.  So, they’ve been having a great time with this, improving their accuracy, so when they can get out on the course, they feel sure that many strokes will have improved.  I can always tell when we have given my son a winning gift, as I never get to try it myself!  Easy to set up and use.  Great gift for the golfer!

title: Great dumbell set
review:
I love this dumbell set! They are fully adjustable from 5 to 50 pounds. Perfect for saving space.
The plates are made out of a plastic type resin, which is much more forgiving than steel.
They adjust easily and feel good in my hand.

title: Good fun

title: Glad I bought it ... but it could use some tweaks
review: I've been wanting a hat that would keep the gnats and bugs out of my face while I'm working outside.  I picked this one because you can securely tuck the netting up out of the way when you don't need it and still have a sun hat. The brim probably needs to be a bit larger to keep the netting further out from touching your face.  The netting material definitely clouds your view/vision especially when there are folds in the netting put that's a small price to pay not to have to keep waving away the gnats.  When the netting is down the bugs will still be there but at least they are on the outside of the netting.  IThe price is so reasonable I would recommend trying it.

title: Greasy residue and leaving gold shimmer everywhere
review: This review is only for the black and gold mat. It smells like burnt rubber which isn't unheard of but the residue makes the mat very slippery. I couldn't hold poses because of it. Also the gold shimmer paint comes off very easily.  It's on my clothes, my hands, and my floor. I tried to wipe it down with a Lysol wipe and that didn't help the greasy residue and just made more gold come off. I'm returning it.

title: Blocks vision
review: I do have a pair of prescription sunglasses but wanted a backup for my regular glasses, since I am consistently going in and out of buildings for my job(I work at a water park). My problem with these are they kind of block my vision where the clip sits on my glasses, it's all I notice and feel like it blurs my vision.

review: Never had the opportunity to use this product. The cap split while attempting to apply for the first time. Very disappointing.

title: Swim cap not for me
review: This cap did not keep the water out. I have hair to the middle of my back. I got all my hair in but it keep creeping up. Every time I moved my head I found myself pulling it down. It also did not keep water out of the ear. After 10 mins I took it off and felt better with out the pressure on my head. Swim caps are not for me.

title: Do NOT buy!
review: Super cute, delivered super fast, and clasp fit great.  Within 4 hours of putting it on the clasp kept opening causing my fitbit to fall off.  5 hours later the clasp came undone again and my fitbit went into my wash machine full of soapy water.  :(  Worst mistake not buying a name brand item.  Now no fitbit.

title: Lasted 3 months with light use.  Never dropped it.
review: My husband got me a pink Princeton tec fuel headlamp for my birthday last September.  In 3 months, the cap that holds the batteries broke and so it wouldn't work.  I called the company and they said they would send me another cap and pin, which they never sent and I called twice.  Then my husband noticed that there was a crack on the housing and he said "it is separating and that is why the cap broke".  I left it on my desk and told the store we bought it from.  I walked in there today and she asked me if I ever got my cap.  I said no.  She said that the company sent her a whole bag of caps and pins because it happens all the time.  I got a cap and pin and came home and while it has been setting on my desk in a corner for 7 months, I noticed the housing is completely cracked up both sides.  No way a cap would fix it.  The store owner said she would replace it on her own dime, but she shouldn't have to do that.  These are not made to last.  Buy another brand.

title: Worrisome Product, Works Though
review: I got this package when some friends were over and we all marveled at how thin and crinkly the bags felt. 10 liters of water? In those? I put them aside for a week or so until there was a hurricane threatening. After rinsing them out several times I filled both bags about ¾s full. I had to have a friend come over and move them. I'm disabled and their weight would have been somewhat dangerous on my walker. I had them put in an unused bathroom's shower figuring if they leaked this would be the best place in the house for that to happen. I'm not a fan of the handles, they're thin. hard and sharp edged, they cut into your hands uncomfortably. I wouldn't want to carry these very far. I would also worry about these getting banged about with sharp rocks and sticks when camping I'm still not 100% trusting of the material, it's really thin. But, they've been in the bathroom almost two months and don't appear to have leaked although they do tend to flop over and don't stand up straight. These have exceeded my expectations which were honest to say, rather low.

title: Nice looking, well designed bottle
review: I drink A LOT of water and some days it’s just boring! Enter fruit infused water and you have a great solution. Some have infusers that go down the middle of the bottle, but you have to do a lot of chopping to make your fruit fit. This has a better design. The fruit goes in the bottom and the water swishes over it. Works great and is a nice looking bottle. No leaks and easy to use and clean. Would have been nice to include a few recipes but I know what I like so it really wasn’t a problem for me and there are a ton of “recipes” online.

review: I was very excited to get this, and very disappointed in what I received.  There are plastic strips at the end of the "tube" and they broke almost immediately.  I tried for about 15 minutes to get the thing inflated with no luck.  I finally got it partially inflated and it was unstable to sit on.  Maybe these things are meant for windy days or maybe this is just a cheap knock off (I don't know since it's the only one I've seen), but it's not something I would recommend.  The concept is great and maybe if the material were a bit lighter it would work better.  Basically this is kind of a canvas material with plastic sewn into it to hold air.

title: Cute (Size 6) Toy Football Is Easy to Grip
review:
This BALLISTIC FOOTBALL (Neon, Size 6) is a cute little toy football for small hands. It's a toy because of the small size, and because of the “seams” and “laces” that are just molded plastic. The pebbled surface is very easy to grip. The neon stripes on the ends are easy to see when the ball is thrown.

The ball is already inflated when it arrives. You can add air easily by using a bicycle pump and an inflator needle. The ball measures 17-3/4" from tip to tip (measuring along the ball's surface). “Ballistic” is the brand name (not a new or different kind of football).

title: Base broke after a few months!
review:
This was a great thing for a few months. Loved the fact that I can mount any small flashlight on it. But the base broke off just after a few months! I keep the bike indoor so I can't say that it's the elements (air, sun etc.) that caused this failure. I do take the bike out everyday and some of the trail can get bumpy, but this kind of mounts are supposed to be able to handle that!

Not going to buy this again. It's not expensive, but when you depend on your bike everyday, this sort of thing is really very annoying!

title: Too Many Issues to Recommend
review:
I have used a few different Omron pedometers in my day and like other consumers, I purchased this one due to the solid reviews. Anything with an overall rating as good as this product should be worth the money. So, with my old pedometer on the fritz, I decided it was time for a new one and purchased this model.

Omron Pocket Pedometer was okay at first. It does measure your total steps, aerobic steps, time, calories burned, and distance. The accuracy seems to be pretty good and I like that I can monitor my progress and check things online with the software. These are all good qualities and they earn the product some respectability.

Where this product loses some points with me is with its cumbersome display; its tendency to go blank; and the lack of any ability to shut it off. With the display, what I don’t like specifically is the annoyance with looking at your statistics from past days. It stores up to a week’s worth of data, which is great, but if you want to view the data from a past day, you have to toggle back and forth between two of the buttons. You can’t just simply go back to the day you want and then view the steps, aerobic steps, time, distance, and calories with one push. You have to push the button to the left a couple of times, then push the button on the right to view one stat, then push the button on the left a couple of times again to view the next stat, etc. Other pedometers are much easier than this.
Another problem is with the tendency of the screen to go blank. This happens to me anytime I drop the pedometer. I have to then get a small screwdriver to remove the back, move the battery around, and screw it back on. The display will them reappear. And, of course, there is the problem with inability to shut the pedometer off. With other pedometers, you can turn it off or it will shut off itself after a certain amount of time has elapsed. It doesn’t work that way here. The display is always on, draining the battery at a fast rate. Sure, you could pop out the battery after each use, but this is too much trouble. Just make sure you have plenty of replacement batteries on hand because you’re going to need them.

So, taken as a whole, this is device is not as good as I expected and I plan to search for a replacement very soon. It’s disappointing for something from Omron. I have had better luck with other pedometers from this company and cannot give this one a recommendation for the reasons cited.

title: Great Design On These Gloves- Pockets too!
review:
When I first sent for these, it was because winters where I live can be really tough. The glove monster always seems to eat up one glove of various pair of them, so I am always on the lookout for some good ones. Let's see how these are..

WHAT ARE THESE GLOVES LIKE?
LENGTH
These gloves are beautifully designed. They are long gloves that go halfway up the forearm. You can wear them over or under a jacket sleeve.

OUTERFABRIC
The outer fabric is a tightly woven black fabric which is a nylon. It is medium thickness, not thin. The palm of the hand is rubberized for easy gripping. There is also rubberized fabric on the tips of each finger as well as entire inner thumb.

LINING FABRIC
The lining is a fleece lining

LINING STABILITY
The lining seems to be sewn up into the glove so they won't be pulling out constantly like some do.

WRIST ADJUSTMENT
These have band on them which is not stretch. It is webbing. There is an adjustable gripper buckle to pull it tighter if you want to, keeping snow and cold air away from the hand. It is not too hard to make larger again.

POCKET
These have a really cool feature- a pocket on the outside of each glove. It zips shut and is big enough to carry a key, credit card, flash drive (OOooo James Bond feature), or anything of comparable size that is not too bulky. That makes it handy to have if you don't carry a purse, pouch, bag, or have pockets accessible easily on the outside in severe weather.

FOREARM ADJUSTMENT
This also has an elastic band at the forearm which can be pulled and locked with a press button lock barrel which is sewn down to the glove so it won't flap around.

SIZING
I have a large sized woman's hand, and my husband has a medium to large sized hand in men's. This fit us both very well with no fingers abnormally long like happens with some gloves. There is plenty of room for those with slightly longer fingers than normal.

LEAKING?
I can not try these in the snow at this time, but when putting splashes of water on them, it was repellant. I will update in the future during the snow season. (it is mid summer right now).

THE BOTTOM LINE
For a REALLY WELL DESIGNED glove that fits well and is well made, this is a great choice. The special features it has are handy to have and I know we will use these a lot this coming winter.

MY RATING
FIVE STARS. I will update in the future if I discover something in the dead of winter to add, but for now, I am VERY impressed with these.

title: Terrible
review: The clicks are mushy and the windage adjustment clicks are not centering on the indicators. The illumination dial is sequential with no off stops between levels. Cheaper scopes can do simple things like this. I also find it of poor taste to include a sticker of the American flag when this sad excuse of a scope is made in China. Of course, the Made In China is not anywhere on the scope and only on the outer sleeve of the unnecessarily complicated box.

title: Very small
review:
[[VIDEOID:670390d5f4bbbcd1c8a0c687f3650946]] Let me start by saying that I am a person that does a lot of research before buying an item. I don't spend on a whim. It may take me weeks or a month before making that buying commitment. I look for something that has all the features I need.
I was looking to replace my air Jordan sling that I've had for at least 15 years , maybe longer. First choice was another air Jordan but I could not get the same style..so I started hunting.
This brand seemed to fit my needs. Had many of the same feature as my old backpack..and this has a bottle holder which my old one did not have. BONUS :) So I waited till prime day and got this for 10dollars cheaper . Oh ,and the reviews were decent .
Well it arrived today and I couldn't be more disappointed. This is really small for my needs. Measurements on this are embellished. Reviews said this was great for a day trip or hike but honestly if you just wear a Tshirt and shorts you would be ok. I wanted to fit work clothes and my lunch in this bag but that isn't happening.
There are many pockets but let's be honest, you can only fit so much inside this bag. Extra pockets don't give you more space, they provide just separation.
We shall see how the durability of this is. No way it will give me 15 years as I'm pretty rough on my bag as it goes everywhere I go. It's hard letting go of a good pair of shoes or a bag or any fashion you have had for many years cause it's hard to replace something so durable. I'm sure many have had that experience.
Overall this is just to small for my needs as you can see in the picture. The measurements are a stretch. Durability we will see and I will update.
1 WEEK later......no issues with the bag. I have been gentle as far as overstuffing it. The size issue is muy inconvenient. Many issues on that topic but just one......I work outdoors and head to work with a hoodie cause its chilly in the a.m. the hoodie wont fit in the bag when the weather warms and i only have a shirt, lunchbag, phone/charger, misc stuff already in it.. Reading the comments , This makes me curious what kind of day trip people are taking in order to use this bag in that fashion..

title: actual contents ok, case totally different, please read review for more info
review:
The information provided in the written part of the product description needs to line up with the pictures as well as what is actually sent. It is NOT THE SAME as what you read or see. There are some spots that are the same, and many that are different. I CAN NOT RECOMMEND THIS based on the mixed information.

HERE IS WHAT I RECEIVED:
--A smooth, zippered soft "hard shell" case (firm but flexible. Think of a cheap sunglass case). This is not at all what is pictured NOR described in the product information. What is pictured is a totally different material. It may not make a difference if you are just looking for some supplies, OR it may make all the difference if you are looking for a particular container as well as supplies. With this as the description, "Durable & Portable Tactical Molle Pouch】ETROL mini Survival Gear is ultralight, compact and portable with a Velcro strap system compatible with MOLLE so that it can be hooked to the backpack, belt or other. It offers large compartments and plenty of room to add your own equipment, including a special phone pocket and an emergency pen slot" NOPE NOPE NONE OF THIS. Just a smooth zippered shell. No means to use it as part of MOLLE system, no extra compartments or special pockets or place to have a pen. They are describing a product even different than shown, and even further off from what I received.

--The product description also states (as of 3/31/20) that, "【Quick Access & Top Quality Durable Supplies】The Survival Gear Kit includes the most popular outdoor survival necessities: 3-mode Tactical Flashlight, black stainless steel Tactical Military Knife, Fire Starter, Compass of the military class, a Multi-Function Tool Card, a loudly Whistle with 120db, Emergency Blankets which can retain 90% of body heat and more. Being customized and uniquely tested, our Survival First Aid Kit is designed to prepare you well in case of outdoor activities " NOPE!! Plastic whistle and emergency blanket, yes. Flashlight, military knife, fire starter, compass, Multi function tool card.. NOPE. I actually didn't expect this, but for it to state this in the description? False advertisement!

Kit is described as measuring 7.5" x 5.1" x 2"
MY KIT measures roughly, 6.5" x 4.75" x 2.5"

--The product description DOES seem to accurately state the medical supplies portion, "【FDA Approved & Professional Treatment Supplies】This First Aid Kit contains the most important first aid supplies for various treatments on the market. Buckle Tourniquet, PBT conforming bandage, Tourniquet, non-woven tape, first aid scissors, plastic tweezers, sterile gauze, a lot of alcohol swabs, cotton swabs, PE adhesive bandages, and safety pins, to stop massive bleeding, dressing or disinfection of wounds nd more, which will come in handy in case of unforeseen events". To see what you are getting, I can say that it 100% matches up to the product description PICTURE of the supplies. ((NOT THE CASE, though))

Furthermore,
--The kit I have has a fairly useless first aid manual. It is labeled as being by "Firstar" (as are the medical packaging), and is visually messy as well as minimally informative. Consider it non essential and add your own emergency steps. As for the contents, again, it is as described according to the product description and pictures. YET If compared to the information provided on the manual, it would not come close to being the same items. For what it is worth, what comes in this kit according to the product description picture is much better.

--Other plusses include that I am pleased with all that is in there, how well it is packed, how easy it is to access the items as well as how surprisingly easy it was to get everything back into the container.

--However I take issue with the misinformation between what is described and what I received. Even if they totally took out the part on all the tactical goodies that is supposed to be in it, and just focused on the medical.. then there would still be the problem of the TOTALLY DIFFERENT case than what is pictured and described. The soft/hard shell zippered case is OK enough, and would be FINE if it were pictured and described as such. But if you are expecting a MOLLE bag/attach capable (that's a big thing), then this would be hugely disappointing.

--So overall, I can not in good conscience recommend a product when it is so far off from what is pictured and described. I have no idea what it costs, and you better believe that a MOLLE style/attachment capable bag is worth more than this soft/hard shell.

--I would include pictures but the photo/video uploader that Amazon usually has in the reviews has been missing for about a week now. If I see that it comes back up, I will be sure to show you the case I have, then you can see how different it is. Again, case is a firm smooth soft shell with zipper. Bright red and labeled, "first aid kit"

If the product description (plus pic of the container) changes, then I can edit this as is reasonable.

Again-- the actual contents according to the picture/graphic is correct. The case is not. The description of the case and other items is entirely wrong. The list of items this kit contains according to the useless weird manual is also wrong, BUT the items included here are better. SO do with this information as you will. I hope it helped you today. Despite the errors in information, it is possible that what I described happens to be exactly what you are looking for. My 1 star rating could be your 5 :)
